alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 05 at 12:03PM PDT until November 06 at 11:11AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Snohomish River At Snohomish affecting Snohomish County. .Heavy rain over the area came to an end early Saturday morning with no hydrological significant rain forecast over the weekend. The lower reaches of the Snohomish Rivers will begin receding later this afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snohomish River At Snohomish. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, the Snohomish River will cause minor flooding of lowlands not protected by levees and on the Old Snohomish-Monroe highway. A stage of 25 feet on the Snohomish River corresponds to a Phase 2 in the Snohomish County flood program. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM PDT Saturday was 25.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise cresting near 26 feet late this morning. It will fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 815 PM PDT.
